distribution.name: Additional_file_S4.1.xls
distribution.description: Highly significant SNPs (genome-wise FDR ≤ 5% and FDR ≤ 1%) resulting from GWAS using single SNP regression mixed linear model for lifetime performance index (LPI), lactation persistency (LP), herd life (HL), indirect herd life (IHL) and daughter herd life (DHL).

distribution.name: Additional_file_S4.2.xls
distribution.description: Previously identified production, fertility or health trait QTL that overlap with the SNPs identified in this study for lifetime performance index (LPI), lactation persistency (LP), herd life (HL), indirect herd life (IHL) and daughter herd life (DHL).
